Articles.Content:
Andrew fancy a battle? Spartwo seems to have disappeared.

I would, but I've only been developing multiplayer-oriented equipment recently. Could we set one up in two days? I need to fill up my arsenal again.

Also, could we try a naval battle? I might have a prototype GMC ready by then. :)

I was also developing some amphibious assault tanks, but I need to build new ones, since they were just prototypes.
a naval battle would be good. I've just finished my first ship so it will be good to do some sea trials. Can we use aircraft as well? (floatplane)

a naval battle would be good. I've just finished my first ship so it will be good to do some sea trials. Can we use aircraft as well? (floatplane)

Sure. Could I bring in the F/A-18 SH then? I need to test its ground-attack capability, since it's a naval attack aircraft. :)

Sure. Could I bring in the F/A-18 SH then? I need to test its ground-attack capability, since it's a naval attack aircraft. :)

lol, I'm bringing a biplane! Its not even got floats on it yet!

So glad its not real time multiplayer!

lol, I'm bringing a biplane! Its not even got floats on it yet!

So glad its not real time multiplayer!

No worries. But want to try a dogfight when multiplayer comes out...

My RIO is going to have fun trying to maneuver the missile. XD

No worries. But want to try a dogfight when multiplayer comes out...

My RIO is going to have fun trying to maneuver the missile. XD

When multiplayer arrives this thread will become much more popular.

When multiplayer arrives this thread will become much more popular.

I've been playing a lot of DarkMultiplayer for the past week. Other players ships are a little glitchy; but it would be cool if we could start organizing a few battles on there. Just think about how awesome it would be to have a real time five player space battle over Kerbin. However laggy it may be

I've been playing a lot of DarkMultiplayer for the past week. Other players ships are a little glitchy; but it would be cool if we could start organizing a few battles on there. Just think about how awesome it would be to have a real time five player space battle over Kerbin. However laggy it may be

That an offer m8?
So is there potential military applications for this? The altitude should read -112m!

That an offer m8?

I suppose it could be xD

Bare in mind I've never even had a real battle though, and my fleet is mainly subscriber-sourced (not saying that's a bad thing)

So is there potential military applications for this? The altitude should read -112m!

http://i.imgur.com/7Uzrtfv.png

Subs were deemed impractical. We need squad to add ballast tanks.

For peaceful research purposes only, of course.

Set up! Only .76 tons to spare!

http://imgur.com/a/imGiw

Persistant

May I ask why you have buggies that have no weapons and serve no purpose?

I want to recover them, as they are only contributing to the massive lag. (Why didn't you space out your vehicles more, the lag

makes it near unplayable) (Or take out some vehicles and lower the max tonnage)

Andrew fancy a battle? Spartwo seems to have disappeared.

I'm working on it.

When multiplayer arrives this thread will become much more popular.

I reckon the thread will die.

Edited August 15, 2014 by Spartwo

I'm working on it.

I reckon the thread will die.

Not an optimist, I see.

Subs were deemed impractical. We need squad to add ballast tanks.

For peaceful research purposes only, of course.

The new large fuel tanks are even better at sinking. We can put more on our subs now and maybe even something practical.

I doubt boat parts will ever come to KSP so I'm happy to keep trying with what I've got.
Well, at least in it's current form. The thread only sets out rules and holds the turns. Once multiplayer happens half the rules go and the turns no longer exist. The thread will turn into KIDI.

May I ask why you have buggies that have no weapons and serve no purpose?

I want to recover them, as they are only contributing to the massive lag. (Why didn't you space out your vehicles more, the lag

makes it near unplayable) (Or take out some vehicles and lower the max tonnage)

They're repair buggies. You can recover them if I can place them later (after some wepons and tanks are dead).

Well, at least in it's current form. The thread only sets out rules and holds the turns. Once multiplayer happens half the rules go and the turns no longer exist. The thread will turn into KIDI.

At least some could remain aka no ramming and carrier rules?

At least some could remain aka no ramming and carrier rules?

And weapons stealing. I was playing around with the new SE update but I'll give you the dignity of losing>

And weapons stealing. I was playing around with the new SE update but I'll give you the dignity of losing>

You can just count it as a win for you. I've only got 1 armed fighter left and you've got 3.
You know what, I'll forfeit all my remaining turns. You can pull a draw out of the bag if your aim is spot on.

They're repair buggies. You can recover them if I can place them later (after some wepons and tanks are dead).

May I ask how they repair? There are no useful parts onboard them Also do you think you could make a new save where you space apart your tanks by at least 2.5km? because it is almost impossible to play the game with all the lag

You know what, I'll forfeit all my remaining turns. You can pull a draw out of the bag if your aim is spot on.

Sadly my fighter can only move if its got full ammo or none. Too unbalanced otherwise.

Might work on some... better ships asap.

Are you planning to continue our battle?

Yes, its just that I still need to finish my move. (PC's lagging every now and then, but I just cleaned it out and it's running MUCH better.)

Post'll be up as soon as I finish attacking.

I suppose it could be xD

Bare in mind I've never even had a real battle though, and my fleet is mainly subscriber-sourced (not saying that's a bad thing)

I'd like to do a little battle in DMP, but it seems that weapons tend to glitch through/around their targets.
